section.p: People come flocking down from the citadel to watch you sail into the bay. There are hundreds of them - not just the crews of the pirate vessels, but their wives and children too. This is a complete community, just like any number of other towns around the world except that their livelihood rests on bare-faced villainy.

. (You can add 2 to the dice roll if your ship is a galleon, and 1 if you have an excellent crew.)
